choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure, here is a healthy meal plan for you for the week:

Monday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, sweet potatoes, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli.

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh berries and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry made with bell peppers, carrots, onions, and broccoli.

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as sweet potatoes, asparagus, and zucchini) and a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable soup made with carrots, onions, garlic, and vegetable broth.

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh berries and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, and onions) and brown rice.

Friday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as sweet potatoes, asparagus, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry made with tofu, broccoli, onions, and bell peppers.

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh berries and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, and onions) and brown rice.

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as sweet potatoes, asparagus, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable soup made with carrots, onions, garlic, and vegetable broth.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
